clinical_study.brief_title: Traditional Chinese Medicine Combined With Standard Triple Region for Eradication of Helicobacter Pylori
clinical_study.official_title: Traditional Chinese Medicine Combined With Standard Triple Region for Eradication of Helicobacter Pylori: a Prospective, Double-blinded, Randomized Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: Xiyuan Hospital of China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences

clinical_study.source: Xiyuan Hospital of China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) decoction and powder combined with standard triple therapy on improving eradication rate of Helicobacter Pylori (H. pylori).A multi-center randomized control clinical trial design was adopted in the trial.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 13C or 14C urea breath test was performed at four weeks after western medicine termination.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Abnormal Laboratory Values and/or Adverse Events That Are Related to Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at baseline, and every week up to four weeks.

arm_group.description: The patients in this group were given 10-day standard triple therapy.
The patients in this group were given 10 days of standard triple therapy + 2-week Xiang-sha-liu-jun decoction.
The patients in this group were given 10days of standard triple therapy + 4-week Xiang-sha-liu-jun decoction.

intervention.description: ten days of standard triple region (20mg omeprazole 20mg, 1.0 amoxicillin, 0.5 clarithromycin, Bid).

overall_official.affiliation: XiYuan Hospital of China Academy of Traditional Chinese Medicine
